Sentencas: The ejectors equipped for anode and cathode recirculation loops are more reliable and low-cost in maintenance than blowers in a solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors

Sentencas: However, an effective control system is one of the technical challenges associated with the development of the hybrid system.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors

Sentencas: In present work, a novel control strategy was designed to restrict the hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors to a safe and feasible zone.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors

Sentencas: Six control loops were carried out to control the vital parameters including power, rotation speed, fuel utilization, anode and cathode inlet temperature, and turbine inlet temperature.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors

Sentencas: At the same time, the performance of another control system without anode inlet temperature control loop was also investigated.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors

Sentencas: A comparison results of the two control systems reveal that both anode and cathode inlet temperature loops are necessary.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors

Sentencas: If there is no anode inlet temperature control loop, the system efficiency decreases by 0.18%, the fuel cell inlet temperature differences between anode and cathode increases by 9 K and the compressor surge margin decreases by 1.8% at 95% system load.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors

Sentencas: It not only causes a little reduction in efficiency but also may cause some latent dangers of the hybrid system at a part load condition.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors

Sentencas: Consequently, the control system with all six control loops is effective and appropriate.
Titulo: Control strategy design for a SOFC-GT hybrid system equipped with anode and cathode recirculation ejectors
